participant_1.name: Ryan
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, often seeking connection with others.
participant_1.background: i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Reflective and ambitious, with a hint of nostalgia about the past.
participant_2.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.
